backend/main.mo: Motoko backend with blog storage, user profiles, email management, and admin allowlist logic using AccessControl and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and tests with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing styling, components, pages, and content configuration.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Guide explaining how to build and deploy the project locally and to the Internet Computer mainnet.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Frontend HTML entry point loading the Vite bundle with fixed title and meta description.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routing, theme, query client, layout, and all page routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Component protecting admin routes by checking Internet Identity authentication and admin status with fallback UI.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with status-aware UI updates.
frontend/src/components/cursor/CustomCur: Empty file placeholder for custom cursor implementation.
frontend/src/components/forms/StudentEnq: A student enquiry form that collects basic details and, after validation, displays a summary with links to contact via WhatsApp, SMS, phone, or email.
frontend/src/components/forms/TeacherEnq: A teacher application form capturing experience and multiple selections, then showing a confirmation with contact links after submission.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: A simple contact form with validation and a mock submission flow that displays a thank-you message on completion.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Market: A marketing site footer showing branding, navigation links, and contact shortcuts for WhatsApp, email, and social links.
A responsive marketing header with navigation links, logo, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/marketing/sectio: A contact section offering WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email options with quick-action buttons.
Renders a FAQ section using an accordion populated from site content.
Displays the hero banner with headline, description, CTAs, and an image, handling navigation on button clicks.
Shows a four-step process using cards with icons and descriptions.
Lists tutoring services as cards with icons, titles, and descriptions.
Displays testimonial cards with ratings, quotes, authors, and roles.
Shows trust metrics using cards with icons, numeric values, and labels.
Presents value propositions in card format with icons, titles, and descriptions.
frontend/src/config/siteConfig.ts: Defines the site name and helper functions for generating page titles and retrieving the site name.
frontend/src/content/legalContent.ts: Provides terms and conditions content with sections referencing the site name.
frontend/src/content/marketingContent.ts: Contains structured marketing content for hero, value proposition, services, how-it-works, and testimonials sections.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides static site data including contact info, social links, form options, trust stats, testimonials, and FAQs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomCursor.ts: Empty placeholder hook with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing authentication, stored identities, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Updates document title and meta description based on provided values.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for blog operations and user profile/admin checks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email links along with formatted messages for student and teacher inquiries.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBlogsPage.tsx: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, publishing, and deleting blog posts with dialog-driven forms and query mutations.
frontend/src/pages/AdminSetupPage.tsx: Handles admin bootstrap flow including email setup, token submission, and admin status verification using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/BlogPostPage.tsx: Displays a single blog post by ID with loading and not-found states, using metadata hooks and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/BlogsPage.tsx: Lists published blog posts with previews and navigation to individual posts, including loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact options like WhatsApp, phone, SMS, and email, using configured contact data and link utilities.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page assembling multiple marketing sections with SEO metadata.
Standalone marketing landing page that manually sets meta tags and renders marketing sections with header and footer.
frontend/src/pages/SetupChecklistPage.ts: Renders a setup checklist page with configurable site settings and status indicators using content constants.
frontend/src/pages/StudentFormPage.tsx: Displays the student enquiry form page and sets metadata for the route.
frontend/src/pages/TeacherFormPage.tsx: Shows the teacher registration form page and applies page metadata.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the terms and conditions page using legal content sections with metadata.
frontend/src/types/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend actor interface with an internal admin initialization method.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides functions to read, store, and manage URL and session parameters including hash-based routing.
frontend/static/growwithtutor-standalone: Static HTML landing page defining layout, sections, and structure for the GrowWithTutor marketing site.
Explains how to run the standalone static GrowWithTutor landing page and its file structure.
Contains editable content data and logic powering the standalone landing pageâ€™s dynamic sections.
Defines global styles, color variables, layout, header, hero section, buttons, and responsive behavior for the standalone landing page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom fonts, colors, radius, shadows, animations, and plugin integrations for project-wide styling.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests related to adding +91 prefixes and maintaining phone/WhatsApp/SMS link functionality.
